Name: PT Air Born Indonesia
Purpose of Financing: To part finance up to 80% of the upfront lease rental, commitment fee,advance payment for maintenance, shipping cost and training cost for one unit AW139 helicopter under operational lease at estimated cost of USD2,200,300.00 or the actual finance cost whichever is lower.

Name: BINA PURI HOLDINGS BHD
Purpose of Financing: To part finance bond as working capital requirements for construction projects awarded to Bina Puri (Thailand) Co Ltd or any other contracts as may be approved by the Bank
